# means absolute value
$ means hex format

OpCodes
txs     ..              9A
rts                     60

lda     zeropage        A5
lda     immediate       A9
lda     absolute        Ad

sta     absolute        8D


## RAM debugging

READ:   ADDR 1000000000000000 (8000)  A2
READ:   ADDR 1000000000000001 (8001)  FF
READ:   ADDR 1000000000000010 (8002)  9A
READ:   ADDR 1000000000000011 (8003)  A9
READ:   ADDR 1000000000000011 (8003)  A9
READ:   ADDR 1000000000000100 (8004)  FF
READ:   ADDR 1000000000000101 (8005)  8d
READ:   ADDR 1000000000000110 (8006)  02
READ:   ADDR 1000000000000111 (8007)  60
WRITE:  ADDR 0110000000000010 (6002)  FF
READ:   ADDR 1000000000001000 (8008)  A9
READ:   ADDR 1000000000001001 (8009)  E0
READ:   ADDR 1000000000001010 (800a)  8D
READ:   ADDR 1000000000001011 (800b)  03
READ:   ADDR 1000000000001100 (800c)  60
WRITE:  ADDR 0110000000000011 (6003)  E0
READ:   ADDR 1000000000001101 (800d)  A9
READ:   ADDR 1000000000001110 (800e)  01
READ:   ADDR 1000000000001111 (800f)  20
READ:   ADDR 1000000000010000 (8010)  38
READ:   ADDR 0000000111111111 (01ff)  00 (30?)
WRITE:  ADDR 0000000111111111 (01ff)  80
WRITE:  ADDR 0000000111111110 (01fe)  11
READ:   ADDR 1000000000010001 (8011)  80
READ:   ADDR 1000000000111000 (8038)  8D
READ:   ADDR 1000000000111001 (8039)  00
READ:   ADDR 1000000000111010 (803a)  60
WRITE:  ADDR 0110000000000000 (6000)  01
READ:   ADDR 1000000000111011 (803b)  A9
READ:   ADDR 1000000000111100 (803c)  00
READ:   ADDR 1000000000111101 (803d)  8D
READ:   ADDR 1000000000111110 (803e)  01
READ:   ADDR 1000000000111111 (803f)  60
WRITE:  ADDR 0110000000000001 (6001)  00
READ:   ADDR 1000000001000000 (8040)  A9
READ:   ADDR 1000000001000001 (8041)  80
READ:   ADDR 1000000001000010 (8042)  8D
READ:   ADDR 1000000001000011 (8043)  01
READ:   ADDR 1000000001000100 (8044)  60
WRITE:  ADDR 0110000000000001 (6001)  80
READ:   ADDR 1000000001000101 (8045)  A9
READ:   ADDR 1000000001000110 (8046)  00
READ:   ADDR 1000000001000111 (8047)  8D
READ:   ADDR 1000000001001000 (8048)  01
READ:   ADDR 1000000001001001 (8049)  60
WRITE:  ADDR 0110000000000001 (6001)  00
READ:   ADDR 1000000001001010 (804a)  60
READ:   ADDR 1000000001001011 (804b)  8D
READ:   ADDR 0000000111111101 (01fd)  8C (88?)
READ:   ADDR 0000000111111110 (01fe)  00
READ:   ADDR 0000000111111111 (01ff)  00
READ:   ADDR 0000000000000000 (0000)  00
READ:   ADDR 0000000000000001 (0001)  00
READ:   ADDR 0000000000000010 (0002)  00
WRITE:  ADDR 0000000111111111 (01ff)  00
WRITE:  ADDR 0000000111111110 (01fe)  03
WRITE:  ADDR 0000000111111101 (01fd)
READ:   ADDR 1111111111111110 (fffe)
READ:   ADDR 1111111111111111 (ffff)
READ:   ADDR 1000000001110110 (8076)
READ:   ADDR 1000000001110111 (8077)
READ:   ADDR 1000000001111000 (8078)
READ:   ADDR 1000000001110110 (8076)
